issue.title: [CF 1652] Tracking soothing mist from the Jade Serpent Statue
issue.body:
I've been trying to use this addon to track the channel from my jade serpent statue of soothing mist but I am unable to make it work. Idk if this is a bug or if the addon isn't able to track this. Any help on this would be greatly appreciated!


> Posted by CurseForge user parzival_81 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1652 | Raw

comments.body:
Because the statue counts as a totem, there isn't much TMW can do with it besides tell you if it exists or not. Just a limitation of the game's API.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
